title: Too High
subtle: Descriptive (fiction), 40 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: Have you ever tried to reach something, but it was too high? Did you feel frustrated that you couldn't get to it? Read Too High to find out what happens when a boy encounters several objects that are too high for him. Use this book to teach students how to analyze a character as well as the proper use of nouns. Detailed illustrations, high-frequency words, and a repetitive sentence structure support early emergent readers.
meta: chair, hook, hoop, roof, shelf, sink
Analyze Character : Analyze characters in the text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant h sound

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
